column1: First start
Tests
Start without any paperwork.conf / index / document
Settings
Tests

When the dialog opens:
To check: scanners correctly detected

Changing work directory:
To check: When "Apply" is clicked, the new directory must be taken into account

Calibration scan: 
To check: When/while no scanner is available, the button can't be clicked
To check: Animation: mouse cursor = spinner
To check: Animation: scan animation
To check: Once the scan is done, the previous calibration settings are displayed

Calibration: 
To check: Handles can be moved
To check: Zoom settings works
To check: Clicking outside of an handle change the zoom level (ajusted --> 1.0 --> adjusted --> ...)
To check: When "Ok" is clicked, the configuration is updated with the new settings

Select another scanner: 
To check: The available resolution list must be reloaded
To check: The calibration scan must be done using the correct scanner
To check: When "Apply" is clicked, the configuration is updated with the selected scanner

Select another resolution: 
To check:
0.2.x: When "Apply" is clicked, the configuration is updated with the new resolution
0.3.x: When the dialog is closed, the configuration is updated with the new resolution

Disable OCR: 
To check: When "Apply" is clicked, the configuration is updated with the new OCR setting

Select OCR + german + 2 angles: 
To check: When "Apply" is clicked, the configuration is updated with the new OCR settings

Select OCR + french + 2 angles: 
To check: When "Apply" is clicked, the configuration is updated with the new OCR settings

Select OCR + french + 4 angles: 
To check: When "Apply" is clicked, the configuration is updated with the new OCR settings
Document viewing
Tests

Zoom level: 
To check: zoom level must be saved when Paperwork stops and restored when Paperwork (re)start

Sorting: 
To check: sorting must be saved when Paperwork stops and restored when Paperwork (re)start

Click on a document: 
To check: Document is selected
To check: Page list is updated
To check: First page is loaded and then displayed

Click on a page: 
To check: 0.2.x: The page is selected in the page list
To check: The page is loaded and then displayed (--> scrolled to the page)

Scrolling: 
To check: On scrolling, page are loaded as they are displayed
To check: 0.2.x: Page are correctly selected in the page list
To check: Page number is updated based on the page on which the user currently is

Keyword highlighting: 
To check: Words below mouse cursor are highlighted

Advanced settings --> highlight all keywords: 
To check: All the keywords are highlighted
To check: When opening another document, keywords are still highlighted
Windows resizing
Predicted labels are displayed in bold
Selected labels are checked
Search
Tests
Ctrl-F: Jump to to the search text field + select the previous search
While typing: Doc list is updated to show only documents containing the keywords (approximate search)
While typing: Page list : Pages of the current document containing the keywords get highlighted
While typing: Keywords are highlighted on the currently displayed page(s)
While typing: Suggestions are provided
Single scan
Tests
Ctrl+N switch to "New document"
Scan animation: Scan is displayed on-the-fly during scanning
Scan animation: Red line shows where the scan currently is
OCR animation: Page is reduced, display 4 times, and rotated 4 times at different angles
OCR animation: Disabled angles are crossed
OCR animation: Spinners are displayed on each active page orientation
OCR animation: Spinners are removed after each OCR process ends
OCR animation: When all the OCR processes are done, zoom on the best one
End of scan & OCR: The new page is displayed and selected
End of scan & OCR: The document is added in the document list and selected
Labels are guessed
Multiple scans
Tests
Multiscan dialog: when the dialog is opened while an editable document is selected, the document list starts with "current document" (+ 0 pages)
Multiscan dialog: when the dialog is not opened while an editable document or is opened on a new document, the document list does not start with "current document"
Multiscan dialog: Clicking on "add" adds a document to the list with 1 page to scan
Multiscan dialog: Clicking on "remove" removes a document from the list
Multiscan dialog: Button "Remove" is disable when the selected document is "current document"
Multiscan dialog: Clicking on "modify" let changes the number of pages for the selected document
Multiscan dialog: Double clicking on the number of pages for a document let change this number
Multiscan dialog: When the scan is started, a thumbnails list is displayed (all gray)
Multiscan dialog: While scanning, the thumbnails are updated on-the-fly
Multiscan dialog: While running the OCR, a spinner is displayed above the corresponding thumbnail
Main window, for each page: Scan animation: Scan is displayed on-the-fly during scanning
Main window, for each page: Scan animation: Red line shows where the scan currently is
Main window, for each page: OCR animation: Page is reduced, display 4 times, and rotated 4 times at different angles
Main window, for each page: OCR animation: Disabled angles are crossed
Main window, for each page: OCR animation: Spinners are displayed on each page orientation
Main window, for each page: OCR animation: Spinners are removed after each OCR process ends
Main window, for each page: OCR animation: When all the OCR processes are done, zoom on the best one
Main window, for each page: End of scan & OCR: The new page is displayed and selected
End of scan & OCR: The document is added in the document list and selected
Page editing
Tests

Page cutting: 
The currently displayed page must be updated
The page thumbnail in the page list must be updated
The doc thumbnail in the page list must be updated

Page rotation: 
The currently displayed page must be updated
The page thumbnail in the page list must be updated
The doc thumbnail in the page list must be updated

Page cutting + rotation: 
The currently displayed page must be updated
The page thumbnail in the page list must be updated
The doc thumbnail in the page list must be updated
Page color correction
Deleting a page
Document editing
Tests
Drag&Drop: Moving pages inside a document
Drag&Drop: Moving pages from a document to another
Drag&Drop: Moving pages from a document to a new one

Document edit dialog/panel: changing the date. 
If the order of the document is changed by the date change, the document list must be updated accordingly
The document must be correctly reselected in the document list
Document edit dialog: adding keywords + finding them by searching
Ctrl+E opens the document edit dialog
Deleting a document
Redo OCR
Tests
Redo OCR on the current document
Redo OCR on all the documents
Printing
Tests
Preview of a portrait page(s)
Printing of a portrait page(s)
Preview of a landscape page(s)
Printing of a landscape page(s)
Import
Tests
Import JPEG / PNG
Import PDF
Number of imported documents displayed
Number of imported pages displayed
Export
Tests
Document export: available formats: PDF
Document export: changing the quality update the preview + estimated size
Document export: saving
Page export: available formats: JPG, PNG
Page export: changing the quality update the preview + estimated size
Page export: changing the format update the preview
Page export: saving
Document export: multiple PDF exports in a folder
Mouse & Keyboard
Tests
Mouse scrolling with 3rd button
Zoom changed with Ctrl+Mouse wheel
Ctrl+PageUp / Ctrl+PageDown to browse documents
Shell
Tests
paperwork-shell scan
